about: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast
Creates knives on the ground which fly upwards after a short delay
Fires a slow-moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning
Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them
Fires projectile that do damage on impact and when they explode
